==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|土|器}}

===Etymology 1===
kaparake → kaɸarake → kawarake. Compound of {{compound|瓦|tr=kawara|t1=tile|笥|tr2=ke|t2=container|lang=ja}}.

====Pronunciation====
* {{IPA|[kawarake]|lang=ja}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|かわらけ|hhira=かはらけ}}

# unglazed pottery
# an unglazed drinking cup
# {{lb|ja|figuratively}} {{lb|ja|sexuality}} a woman who does not grow pubic hair

=====Synonyms=====
